name: Castle Knatterfels: Curse of the Zombie Krauts
name_original: Castle Knatterfels: Curse of the Zombie Krauts
description:
Castle Knatterfels: Curse of the Zombie Krauts is an arcade game developed by RedFire Software. It came out on 01-01-2006. It was published by RedFire Software.
You can play Castle Knatterfels: Curse of the Zombie Krauts on PC.
